summary: When the daughter of a powerful senator is kidnapped by a psychopath, the senator requests a particular homicide detective, Caitlyn Conner, to head up the case. She knows the kidnapper ... See full summary »
cast: Natalie Zea|Michael Ironside|Ron Lea|Graham Cuthbertson|Ricky Mabe|Vincent Hoss-Desmarais|Alexandra Valassis|Andrew Johnston|Chad Connell|Éléonore Lamothe|Ellen David|Jennifer Morehouse|Mark Hauser|Alex Weiner|Bobby Lamont|Nancy Helms|Mark Slacke|Gilles Plouffe|Cassandra Togneri|Deke Richards|Jamie Haydon-Devlin|Tony Truax|Daniel Aucoin|Maxime Savaria|Neil Davison|Nina Lauren|Basil McKenna|Claude Huard
title: El peso de la maldad
